faq.question: acer chromebook  can you upgrade the RAM?
faq.answer: The RAM is soldered to the board. You cannot upgrade it.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can i run a game or two using steam?
faq.answer: In order to do that you would have to install the Linux version of steam. If you want to play steam games buy a windows pc.

faq.question: acer chromebook  I am looking for a laptop to use exclusively for art programs?
faq.answer: Unless those are web based programs or available on Android, No.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Does it have a headphone jack
faq.answer: Yes, it has a 3.5mm headphone jack.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can I run android apps on this?
faq.answer: Yes, you can download apps from the Google Play Store

faq.question: acer chromebook  Does Acer make a computer with this screen size, and this kind of case, but substantial memory like 500GB?
faq.answer: They actually make several, depending on what you want to spend and what you want for an OS.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can i use wireless earbuds with it?
faq.answer: This Chromebook is Bluetooth enabled so yes you can. I have and they work great.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can this run adobe and or java?
faq.answer: A Chromebook cannot run software. However, if there is an Android app for either, you can get the app.

faq.question: acer chromebook  can we cast the display?
faq.answer: You can cast the display onto an external monitor or TV. It has an HDMI port for this purpose.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Are Microsoft office apps downloadable on this labtop?
faq.answer: Use the web version of office it’s free. Mark Dymek · December 9, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Which acer chtomebook has backlit keyboard?
faq.answer: Not sure about that

faq.question: acer chromebook  Would this be good for work?
faq.answer: I do belive there are exel as well as Microsoft Office apps for Chrome but keep in mind all documents would be stored in Google Chrome cloud. Unit has little memory and is designed to use cloud. I belive you get a lot of cloud storage free. I also believe there is a beta app for widows available. faq.question: acer chromebook  Do the keys light up
faq.answer: No Rudy Barr. · January 27, 2020

faq.question: acer chromebook  can you play minecraft and Roblox? Is there enough room to play so the computer doesn't lag?
faq.answer: You can play the android version. Mark Dymek · December 9, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Se conecta con Bluetooth?
faq.answer: la laptop tiene bluetooth Miriam Gonzalez · December 16, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can I get iTunes on this to store music for iPhones?
faq.answer: iTunes is not available as an app for Chromebooks, but you can access your iTunes library by doing a search on How to use iTunes for Chromebook

faq.question: acer chromebook  On the outside of the chromebook, is the surface smooth?
faq.answer: It is smooth to touch but has a very subtle texture matt design on top. I think it is attractive. AZ VIEW · December 9, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Does this chromebook have bluetooth?
faq.answer: Yes it does have Bluetooth. As an aside Google is your friend. You can use Google to get answers to questions! old_elvis_fan · December 16, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Tiene puerto hdmi?
faq.answer: Si tiene, en lo personal no lo he utilizado, pero si lo tiene. Amazon Customer · November 26, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  can it run Linux?
faq.answer: Yes, you can install the chrome-debian version if linux and run Linux apps

faq.question: acer chromebook  does all chroome book automatically have wif connection?
faq.answer: Yes. All Chromebooks will have wifi connection. justin b

faq.question: acer chromebook  Does it come with a charger?
faq.answer: The charger is the cord and square box that you get with the Chromebook to plug in to charge your battery. A lot of people think there are 2 different cords. Just the one. Once your battery is charged your Chromebook or laptop is charged. L. Carothers · November 30, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can I use a active stylus?
faq.answer: No, this Chromebook supports capacitive touch type styluses

faq.question: acer chromebook  is there a uk charger?
faq.answer: All Acer laptops ship with an AC adapter that supports 100v-240v. The only thing you would need is an adapter for the plug end of the US power cord to fit the outlets outside North America. Acer America Manufacturer · December 12, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Is the keyboard backlit?
faq.answer: No, it’s not P-Dowg · October 3, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can it be used for drawing apps with stylus?
faq.answer: Yes, but note this supports a capacitive touch type stylus, not a digital pen type stylus

faq.question: acer chromebook  What is the largest GB sd card it can process?
faq.answer: It can support upto 512bg sd card.

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can you use itunes on this?
faq.answer: iTunes is a program that must be installed onto the laptop. Chromebooks run off apps like an Android phone or tablet. It's doubtful that Apple has made an app available for Chromebooks

faq.question: acer chromebook  Gorilla glass?
faq.answer: No, but they sell many gorilla glass screen protectors on Amazon. Just make sure you are buying for the correct model of Chromebook.

faq.question: acer chromebook  can I open up word files and excel sheets on this without having to install microsoft products?
faq.answer: Yes, you can through google drive. If you're not familiar with google drive it is a simple online google version of Microsoft office.

faq.question: acer chromebook  How many gigabytes of space does it have?
faq.answer: This Chromebook has a 32GB eMMC card for storage

faq.question: acer chromebook  Can it be connected to a printer?
faq.answer: Yes. Concerned there may be a problem but printer and Chrome registered on same Wi-Fi so no printing problems so far. AZ VIEW · December 9, 2019

faq.question: acer chromebook  Will my huion kamvas 16 work with this? i just bought the kamvas not knowing u needed a computer for it to work
faq.answer: Huion will work , but only as an extention. Alot of operations will be limited, i.e., no pen pressure, no screen ratio, etc. There is no chromebook driver available for Huion. justin b

faq.question: acer chromebook  Es resistible, la quiero para mi hija que la tendria que llevar al colegio todos los dias.
faq.answer: Considero que si, el material es robusto, yo la he utilizado por mas de un mes y me parece una buena compra
